frame.name: Fire_going_out
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Fire</fen> goes out.
<ex><fex name="Fire">The fire</fex> is expected to <t>burn out</t> <fex name="Time">within a week</fex>.</ex>
</def-root>

FE.name: Depictive
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Depictive</fen> phrase describing an undergoer of an action during their participation in the event. </def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the state of the <fen>Fire</fen> that affects the nature of the event.</def-root>

FE.name: Result
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Result</fen> of the event.</def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the <fen>Fire</fen> goes out.
<ex>The Forest Service said they will have dedicated employees <fex name="Place">in the woods</fex> day and night until the fire <t>is quenched</t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Fire</fen> goes out.</def-root>

FE.name: Fire
FE.definition:
<def-root>The combustion process that comes to an end.
<ex><fex name="Fire">The fire</fex> <t>went out</t> this morning .</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE describes the how near the <fen>Fire</fen> is to going out.
<ex>The firefighters have <fex name="Degree">nearly</fex><t>extinguished</t> the blaze.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Explanation
FE.definition: <def-root>The Explanation denotes a proposition from which the main clause (headed by the target) logically follows. This often means that the Explanation causes the target's proposition, but not in all cases. </def-root>

FE.name: Circumstances
FE.definition: <def-root>Circumstances describe the state of the world (at a particular time and place) which is specifically independent of the event itself and any of its participants. </def-root>

FE.name: Containing_event
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE denotes an event that occurs or state of affairs that holds at a time that includes the time during which the event or state of affairs reported by the target occurs and of which it is taken to be a part.
</def-root>

lexUnit.name: gutter out.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: Cease to burn, preceded by sputtering
